apcsa.franklin.inheritance.geo

Class Point

  • java.lang.Object
    • apcsa.franklin.inheritance.geo.Point
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable

    public class Point
extends java.lang.Object
implements Drawable
    This class represents a Point object. It has an x and a y coordinate and can calculate distance from itself to another Point. It also has an equals method to determine if it is the same as another point (same x and y). It can also determine the slope between points and can determine if three points all lie on the same line. Since Point is Drawable, it has a translate and a draw method. Implements: Drawable.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
